plot outline: Dhruv Narang, aka 'The King of Romance' is desperately in search of a muse for his new romantic novel. Fate leads him to meet Hemal Shah: a bonafide anti-romance corporate. In a twisted tale of events they're forced to work together. Will Hemal become his muse or will Dhruv be the end of her career? Watch Black Coffee to see how their relationship brews in this new-age romcom.
title: Black Coffee
plot: Dhruv Narang, aka 'The King of Romance' is desperately in search of a muse for his new romantic novel. Fate leads him to meet Hemal Shah: a bona fide anti-romance corporate. In a twisted tale of events they're forced to work together.

Dhruv Narang, aka 'The King of Romance' is desperately in search of a muse for his new romantic novel. Fate leads him to meet Hemal Shah: a bonafide anti-romance corporate. In a twisted tale of events they're forced to work together. Will Hemal become his muse or will Dhruv be the end of her career?
